sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.583, 'Quartettino V°...' (for title, see No. 207)
ms_copies_parts: Paris, Bibl. de l'Opéra, Réserve 507 (2) (for title and comment, see No. 207)
Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.585 and M.586. Two copies made in Berlin for Frederick William II
sources.first_edition: 1958, Rome, del Turco, in vol. 1 in the series Classici Italiani della Musica published under the auspices of UNESCO (score; revised by Pina Carmirelli)
later_editions: 1960, Hamburg/London, Simrock (separate parts: revised by W. Höckner and H. Mlynarczyk)

entries.notes: The minuetto is incorporated in the Allegro vivo assai, a part of which is repeated after it. Unpublished in Boccherini's life-time.

partial_notes: Entry 212 appears to continue from previous page with only the string quartets header visible at top, and the full entry details begin mid-page
